meanings.definition: The state or quality of being identical.
meanings.sent1: The identicalnesses of the twins made it hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The identicalnesses of the two paintings fooled many art experts.
meanings.sent3: The identicalnesses of the two cakes caused confusion at the party.
meanings.sent4: The identicalnesses of their voices on the phone was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The identicalnesses of the fingerprints helped solve the crime.

meanings.definition: The fact of being the same in every detail.
meanings.sent1: The identicalnesses of the two snowflakes amazed the scientist.
meanings.sent2: The identicalnesses of the two keys made it impossible to tell them apart.
meanings.sent3: The identicalnesses of the two jokes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The identicalnesses of their outfits at the party was unplanned.
meanings.sent5: The identicalnesses of the two signatures raised suspicions.
